applicability_test: Controller that, during a calendar year, controls or processes personal data of 100,000 or more consumers

threshold_type: Annual Consumer Data Volume + Revenue from Sale
revenue_condition: Derives revenue or receives discount from sale of personal data
applicability_test: Controller that, during a calendar year: (a) controls or processes personal data of 25,000 or more consumers; AND (b) derives revenue or receives a discount on the price of goods or services from the sale of personal data
